name: Going Down (Lurrkkin)
description:
CAN YOU MAKE IT TO THE BOTTOM FLOOR

Every floor you descend, the brutish chargers get more powerful, see further, and attack faster!  Time your dashes to avoid damage!

Your trusty Blaster can help you defeat enemies but don't get reckless, if not upgraded it WILL overheat. Give it a moment to cool down.

Check lockers and terminals for items to use.

Data Chips can make you more powerful but the data is volatile and may corrupt. Find them at computer Terminals and become your best self!

Everything has value. Even the upgrade items. Your score is determined by how much your inventory is worth at the end.

Scrap what you don't need, is that Stimpack worth keeping if you can't pick up a new data chip? Inventory management is core to your score!

W/S - Scroll Menus

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Use/Accept

Escape - Back

UP Arrow - Dash/Dodge

LEFT/RIGHT Arrows - Shoot

Left Mouse - Shoot

Right Mouse - Dash/Scrap Selected Inventory Item 

F - Open Inventory

Please Enjoy! This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48;

Art and Programming by Lurkin

https://twitter.com/Lurrkkin
